title: Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless

reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's argyle pattern and excellent quality, finding it super soft and not itchy. The fit receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it pairs well with wide-leg jeans, and they appreciate its comfort and color. The length and size receive mixed reviews - while some find the length great, others say it's rather short, and while many consider it perfectly oversized, some find it too huge

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Love this sweater. Fits well and looks great with various styles, including layered with button up or long-sleeved shirt. Comfortable and soft material. Vest is not very thick, which I prefer for layering. Read more
items.author: A B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vest!
items.body: Perfectly oversized. It’s a great staple in any wardrobe. I’m grabbing other colors Read more
items.author: Izzy's Girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, but shorter than advertised
items.body: Lightweight sweater vest in a pretty burgundy color. It’s not as long as the photos show, though. I’m 5’4” and wear a medium size, and it hit just below my hips. The shipping was slow, but I didn’t need it any sooner. I’m still happy with the item, even though it’s shorter than I hoped. Read more
items.author: CindyReg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Layering Piece!
items.body: I loved these more than I thought that I would! I was just looking for another layering piece since I would be visiting a super cold area during the winter. It’s a nice length and a bit loose which was actually ideal for the look and coverage I was going for. Pretty soft, and has that nice ivory color that was a perfect for that off-white aesthetic that I envisioned. Read more
items.author: Christie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish description was more on point
items.body: Garment is cute. Con...not at all oversized. Cannot be worn as a dress. Size not too big as stated in some comments. I am an XS in most things. I tried the Small because comments stated ran big. Not true. Definitely doesn't cover much of my backside to wear as a dress. It's just a top. Advertising pics are probably at least 3 sizes up in order to get that dress oversized look. I am returning the small because I'm sure once I was it will shrink. It would probably still look nice but not 4he reason or the look I purchased it for. 3 stars for cuteness. 1 star for unreliable description. Read more
items.author: Myexperience

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: Buy this! You won’t be disappointed. Received compliments all day. It was soft, warm and good quality. Read more
items.author: Sherri Daley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice vest
items.body: Love it! Good quality and very in style for fall. Great when paired with a wool shirt and knee high boots. Read more
items.author: Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight sweater
items.body: Fits great, true to size. It’s long enough for tunic length. Very lightweight and the color is exactly as pictured. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-light Pink, 2-apricot, 1-khaki Solid, 1-black White Houndstooth, 1-apricot Red, 1-apricot, 1-checkered Black, 1-army Green, 1-black, 1-speckle Gray, 1-burnt Orange, 1-apricot White Houndstooth, 1-light Blue, 1-checkered Light Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
